languages.text: "На объекте, в крипте. Проводит экстренный старт финального этапа операции... По крайней мере, я на это надеюсь. Либо уже мертв. Если вдуматься, оснований предполагать последнее не так уж и мало".

"At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."
languages.original_text: "На объекте, в крипте. Проводит экстренный старт финального этапа операции... По крайней мере, я на это надеюсь. Либо уже мертв. Если вдуматься, оснований предполагать последнее не так уж и мало".

traits.locale_text: "In the crypt on the object. Conducting the emergency start of the operation's final phase... At least I hope so. Or already dead. Now that I think of it, there are quite a few reasons to assume the latter."

"In the crypt on the object. Conducting the emergency start of the operation's final phase... At least I hope so. Or already dead. Now that I think of it, there are quite a few reasons to assume the latter."

"At the site, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

"At the site, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

"At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

"At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

languages.text: «En la instalación de la cripta, ocupado con los preparativos de la ejecución de emergencia de la fase final de la operación... espero. También es posible que esté muerto. Ahora que lo pienso, hay razones de sobra para creer que es el caso».
languages.original_text: "At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

traits.locale_text: «En la instalación de la cripta, ocupado con los preparativos de la ejecución de emergencia de la fase final de la operación... espero. También es posible que esté muerto. Ahora que lo pienso, hay razones de sobra para creer que es el caso».

languages.text: « Sur le site, dans la crypte. Il prépare le lancement d'urgence de la dernière étape de l'opération... Du moins, je l'espère. Sinon, il est déjà mort. Il y a suffisamment de raisons de supposer que c'est le cas, maintenant que j'y pense. »
languages.original_text: "At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

traits.locale_text: « Sur le site, dans la crypte. Il prépare le lancement d'urgence de la dernière étape de l'opération... Du moins, je l'espère. Sinon, il est déjà mort. Il y a suffisamment de raisons de supposer que c'est le cas, maintenant que j'y pense. »

languages.text: 「施設の地下室で作戦の最終ステージの緊急始動準備をしてた…少なくともそうだと思いたいね。もしくは既に死んでたか。思い返せば、後者だと考えるに十分な理由があるね」
languages.original_text: "At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

traits.locale_text: 「現場で、地下室でさ。作戦の最終ステージの緊急始動準備をしてた…少なくともそうだと思いたいね。もしくは既に死んでたか。思い返せば、後者だと考えるに十分な理由があるね」

languages.text: “他就在这里，在墓穴里，为行动的最后阶段做紧急准备……至少我希望是这样。或者说，他也可能死了。现在想想看，我觉得他相当有可能已经死了。”
languages.original_text: "At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

traits.locale_text: “他就在这里，在墓穴里，为行动的最后阶段做紧急准备……至少我希望是这样。或者说，他也可能死了。现在想想看，我觉得他相当有可能已经死了。”

languages.text: "In der Einheit, in der Krypta. Vorbereitungen für den Notstart der letzten Phase der Operation ... Jedenfalls hoffe ich das. Oder er ist bereits tot. Wo ich so darüber nachdenke, es gibt genügend Gründe, von Letzterem auszugehen."
languages.original_text: "At the facility, in the crypt. Making preparations for the emergency launch of the operation's final stage... At least I hope so. Or else he's already dead. Now that I think about it, there are enough reasons to assume the latter."

traits.locale_text: "Vor Ort, in der Krypta. Vorbereitungen für den Notstart der letzten Phase der Operation ... Jedenfalls hoffe ich das. Oder er ist bereits tot. Wo ich so darüber nachdenke, es gibt genügend Gründe, von Letzterem auszugehen."
